Package com.jvn.musilog.view

Class PlaylistAdapter

java.lang.Object
androidx.recyclerview.widget.RecyclerView.Adapter<TrackViewHolder>
com.jvn.musilog.view.PlaylistAdapter
public class PlaylistAdapter extends RecyclerView.Adapter<TrackViewHolder>
Adapter for a playlist to be used in a RecyclerView.
Since:
2024-04-06
Author:
Poleon Banouvong
